And while feral wolves tended to just have fur, Anthro Wolfesses had long hair and the boys short, so you could tell the difference. She wore a pink tang top, a Denim jacket and jeans. And her tail was long and fluffy, it looked like a pillow you could rest on. Her hair was brunette, which blended in well with her silver coat of fur. And her breast size was DDD, not that you really knew this, but when you see them, they're each bigger then your head. But with her toned body, they didn't look out of place for her. They fit her body nicely. She as a head, maybe 2 heads taller then your own mother. Now, you've always had a thing for wolves. And your mom knew this. And you're a 4 year old, so it was cute to see how much you loved them.

1111213.content:
So, here's a twist for you. You and your Mom don't live in the world most humans know. Those myths about Antarctica being an ice wall instead of a continent. Well, turns out those stories were true. Only a few humans from the ancient past had decided to go beyond the wall, where they found new lands. Some of them with people much like themselves. Others with Anthro creatures.Your ancestors had come to settle on a land that was ruled by Anthro Wolves. They welcomed your ancestors, and treated them as equals, for they did not believe in slavery.

And Rhea was their Queen. Sure she had servents, but they were volunteers, and very much enjoyed their job. And Rhea ruled with a strict system. Anyone who broke their laws were either imprisoned for 20 years or more, or given the death sentence, depending on the severity of the crime. One of the worst offenses was bringing harm to little ones, like yourself. And they had technology that equaled if not bettered that of the Modern day world most humans are aware of.

And Rhea had known your mother since she, herself was a pup. They grew up together, so her being your babysitter was amazing to find out. You'd be getting babysat by royalty today. "RHEA!!" You squeal in excitement.

You jump up to her, and she catches you, giving you a big warm hug. "Hello there my little one. Great to see you again," She said.

Your mom smiled and said her goodbyes, as she headed to her job. You and Rhea wave to her, and Soon Rhea looks to you and says, "Well honey, I have a surprise for you today," Rhea said.

"What is it Rhea?" You ask.

"Well.........."

You were surprised, but for some reason, you didn't feel scared that your age was reversed. Nancy, while you never admitted it openly to your "former" classmates, was always like a mother to you. Now your mother wasn't abusive, but she paid you very little attention, only giving you the basic means to survive. A house, a bed, and things to consume to keep you healthy physically. But the reason you still bottle fed and used pull-ups was cause your mom found it easier to feed you formula, and change you more often then teach you how to go.

111134222.content:
(Note: Your name will be Troy in this story line.)

While you were very much aware that Anthro creatures existed, and had nothing against them. But to see one up close, that was a first for you.

"This is your new babysitter Rhea, dear. She'll be looking after you while I am at work," your mom explained.

"Hello there Troy. It's nice to finally meet you," Rhea stated.

You approached her, awestruck. "H-hi," was all you could blurt out as you shook her furry hand.

They both giggled. "Nothing to be worried of dear. I've gotten that reaction with many human children I babysit. By the end of the night, the beg me to continue babysit them. Trust me, I'll make sure you have a great time with me," Rhea assured you.

"Now be nice for Rhea. And don't be afraid to tell her you need a change if you have an accident honey," your mom ordered.

You nod, and soon your mom heads out the door to work.

"So, sweetie. Would you like to watch some cartoons, or play some video games while I prep myself for your lunch?" Rhea asked.

You weren't exactly sure what she meant by prep herself for your lunch, but you answered, "Um, I'll play Kingdom Hearts in the living room if that's okay."

Rhea nodded, "Of course sweetie. But first I need to....."

112211.content:
You stumbled into the living room, expecting this babysitter to be like all the others; some high school girl looking to make a quick buck, or if you were unlucky, one of your mom’s friends who always babied you. You sighed at the thought. You were too old to even need a babysitter! You could cook for yourself, clean up after yourself. You don’t live in a bad neighborhood, so it’s not dangerous to be alone for a night. But regardless, your mother always insists on hiring some sitter to constantly pester you while you’re trying to play video games…

Indeed, you expect this night to be the same boring night as always. The moment you stepped into the living room, though, you realized this couldn’t be further from the truth! Standing right there in the front door was… well, it took your brain a few moments to process just what she was. First of all, she was absolutely huge! She had to lean over just to fit through the doorway! And not only was she taller than any human could be, but she was also incredibly plump, too, though with a curvaceous figure that lacked cellulite or fat rolls, almost as if she was meant to be this blubbery.

At first, you thought she was just pale… but once you noticed that her body was actually covered in a thick layer of white floor, you finally put two and two together. She was an anthro! Anthros were incredibly rare, making up less than 1% of the population, and the ones that did exist had many strange and unusual characteristics. This one seemed to be a polar bear. She was wearing a big, comfy brown sweater, and nothing else. “Jeremy, this is your babysitter, Lydia!” Your mother smiled.

Intimidated by the bear woman’s sheer size and species, you hide behind your mother, shaking. “Don’t be rude, Jeremy! Say hello!” Your mother frowned, pushing you in front of her. Soon, you were quivering as you stood in front of the bear woman, consumed by her shadow as she loomed over you, making it evident just how huge she was compared to you. She smiled a warm, lazy smile as she bent over until you were just about at eye-level.

“Good afternoon, lil guy! Why, you’re so cute, I could just eat you up~!” She giggled, obviously not meaning anything by it. You, of course, quake in fear at the thought of being gobbled up by the massive bear lady. She frowns when she notices just how frightened you are. “Awww. What’s the matter, sweetheart?”

You were shaking where you stood, but you still managed to muster the courage to respond. “I… I’ve… never really seen one of… you… up close before…” You whimper.

“Are you saying you’re afraid of her just because she’s an anthro?” Your mother crossed her arms, visibly upset. “Jeremy, I am disappointed in you! I thought I raised you-”

“No, no. It’s perfectly alright, ma’am. I get this all the time. He doesn’t mean anything by it,” the bear waved a hand dismissively, and your mother went silent, trusting her judgement. “Now, listen, sweetheart. I’ve babysitted plenty of little boys and girls who were scared of me when we first met, just ‘cause I’m a bear. But ya know what? By the end of the night, they all loved me! Cause I may be a big ol’ bear, but I’ve got a big heart, too!” She paused for a moment, as if thinking. “Hey! Do ya happen to own a teddy bear?”

You pause, a little embarrassed. “... yeah,” you confess.

“Well, think of me like a big ol’ teddy bear, then!” She smiled. “Sure, I may look big… but all I wanna do is give ya the warmest cuddles you’re ever gonna get, if only you’ll let me!” With that, she reached her arms out, offering you a great big bear hug. You looked at her, nervously. She did seem big and scary… but on the other side, the look on her face made her look really, really nice. She didn’t seem like she was mean or anything! You cautiously took a few steps forward, and let her wrap her arms around you…

You’re suddenly pulled up against her fluffy body, completely enveloped in her soft fluff as she wraps you in the biggest, literal bear hug of your life! Her giant cheek nuzzles you as she sways back and forth, cooing as she cuddling you with all her might! Her fur was immediately so soft and warm, and her hug so comfortable and gentle, you immediately went limp in her arms, relaxing and enjoying her happy cuddles. “See? I’m not so scary! I’m just a big snuggle bug!” She smiles, noticing you get more comfortable as your fears slip away. She really was nice!

Your mother giggled at this sight, already seeing you warm up to your babysitter. “Alright! Have fun you too!” She said as she started to leave, and you both waved to her as she trotted out the door. It was just you and this bear lady now.

“Well, my name’s Lydia, lil guy! I already know your’s is Jeremy!” She smiles down at you, and you giggle as she gently boops your nose with a finger. She walks over and sits down on the couch, still cuddling you in her arms. “So, what do you like to do for fun, sweet heart?”

You consider it, before answering. “I like to...
112211.title: Bear

1122111.content:
You loved video games! In fact, you had just been playing one when your mother called you out into the living room. Seeing the look of excitement on your face when you blurted out your answer, Lydia giggled, seeing this as an opportunity to befriend you. “Oh! Well, would you mind if I played some games with you?” You quickly nodded eagerly. You were ALWAYS up to play some video games with someone! “Wonderful! Now, I’m not a big gamer or anything, so take it easy on me, okay? Hehe!”

You giggled back, amused by the thought of ‘going easy’ on such a big, powerful bear. “Ok!” You nod, before pointing her towards your bedroom as she gently carries you through the halls. Her big, bright eyes lit up when she saw what you were playing.

“Oh my goodness! A Nintendo 64!?” She gently set you down on the couch in front of your television, before eagerly getting on her knees and sorting through the games you own. “Oh, I used to play these all the time when I was your age!” You giggled at the sight of her getting so excited! Since she wasn’t wearing pants, you can even see her tiny tail wagging. “What are you playin’?”

“Mario Kart,” you reply, and she gets a thrilled look in her eyes as she recognizes that name. “Think you can handle it?” You ask, playfully.

Suddenly, she had a look of amused determination on her face! “Oh, you’re on!” With that, the whole couch shook and groaned beneath her weight as she suddenly plopped herself down beside you, almost taking up the entire couch! With that, it was on! You both playfully taunted eachother as you played, and you’re immediately surprised by the fact that she’s a lot better at the game than you expected. You were about evenly matched in skill, and at some points, she was even giving you a run for your money! “Hehe! Try to keep up!” She teased.

After a few rounds, though, you were starting to pay less attention to the game and more attention to her. You were fascinated by just how different she was compared to humans, and you couldn’t help but wonder what her life is like. How does she deal with all that fur during the summer, for example? “Uh… so… if you don’t mind me asking… what’s it like? Being, ya know… a bear?” You ask her, sheepishly.

“Oh, overall, it’s pretty much just like being a human! Except I’m a lot snugglier,” she explained, without skipping a beat. “My only complaint is, people always assume I’m scary or mean just ‘cause I’m really big…”

“Oh…” You frowned, looking at the ground, suddenly feeling guilty for how to reacted to her when you first met. “Like… me?”

She sighed when she saw how remorseful you were, and planting one of her huge paw-hands on your head, playfully ruffling your hair. “Awww! You don’t have to feel bad or anything, little guy!” She smiled, planting a smooch on your forehead. “I understand I can look a lil’ scary if you’ve never seen an anthro before. Water under the bridge, right?” You relax a little in her arms, leaning up against her side as she cuddles you more, and you return back to playing the game.

After you try out a couple different games together, it was eventually time for lunch. After that, you had to decide how to spend the rest of your day together...
1122111.title: ... play games!"

1122142.content:
Took her long enough! Your mother had bragged that this sitter was one of the highest-rated sitters in the area, but you guess the standards must not be very high, considering this sitter was already super late! Your mother had somewhere to be urgently, so she had been anxiously pacing back and forth waiting for this sitter to arrive. As the sitter stomped up to your apartment, however, you realized the very ground was shaking, and the footsteps sounded like they bore the weight of tons. What on Earth? It sounded like you were going to be babysat by a T-Rex!

The reality wasn’t much less crazy. Soon, the door to your apartment was pushed open… and standing in the doorway was the largest woman you’ve ever seen! Both in terms of height - her head almost brushed up against the ceiling, indicating she was almost 10 feet tall - and not only that, but she was so pudgy, she could barely fit through the door! Once she did, though, you were given an even more fascinating look at her body. Her blubbery body was covered in thick, gray skin, she had a long tail behind her, and most notably, she had the head of a… hippopotamus?

Your jaw just about hit the floor! You quickly realize she was one of those ‘anthros’ you’ve been hearing about. Now, you did know a few anthros - there was that nice leopard lady that worked at the coffee shop around the corner, and that one wolf boy you knew in elementary school. But they were more… regular sized. This hippo was GIGANTIC! She was unlike anything you’ve ever seen before. You stared up at her in awe as she walked in, her blubbery body jiggling with every powerful step. “Sorry I’m late! I had to take the stairs up here… and let me tell you, stairs are killer on a gal my size!” She apologized with a big smile.

“Oh! I’m so sorry! I should’ve warned you,” your mother shook her head with a chuckle, just happy the hippo has finally made it. You let out a quiet, startled yelp as your mother gently pushes you forward, and you find yourself standing right in front of the hippo. “Ah, Hilda. This is my son, Jeremy!”

She immediately lit up with delight as she looked down on you. “Awww! Well, ain’t you just the yummiest little thing?” She bent over with a huge grin on her face, as she cooed over your adorableness. For some reason, her smile didn’t comfort you at all. In fact, it only made you more nervous. She wasn’t looking at you like she found you cute… she was looking at you like she found you TASTY. You felt like she was sizing you up to be a snack! “My name’s Hilda, lil guy! It’s a pleasure to eat- I mean… meet you! Hehe!”

You were horrified by what she was saying. The look on her face, combined with those little ‘jokes’ she was telling… you were getting the distinct feeling you were going to end up as this hippo’s lunch! You gaze nervously at her huge, round belly, seeing just how much bigger it was than you. “Mhmm. Play nice with Hilda now, Jeremy! She’ll be taking care of you while I’m away!” Your worries are interrupted by your mother patting you on the back, just happy she can finally get going.

“M-Mom…” You reply, nervously, in disbelief she can be so oblivious! She was practically serving you on a silver platter to this giant, hungry hippo woman! Before you can say another word, though, the hippo suddenly wraps her plump arms around you, and you’re suddenly wrapped in a tight hug, your protests muffled completely as she squeezes you against her blubber!

“Don’t worry, Miss Collins! I’ll make sure to take GOOD care of this lil guy!” She giggles, hearing you try to shout something, only to be muffled by her pudge.

Without thinking twice, your mother just steps through the door, waving to you. “Alright! Remember, Jeremy; bedtime at 9, and don’t try to get out of it. Don’t give your sitter any trouble, alright?” You were kicking your legs in panic as she left! She couldn’t leave you here alone with this hippo! You’d probably end up as dinner! “Love you, honey!” With that, your mother closed the door behind her, possibly sealing your fate.

With that, the hippo giggles as she pries you off of her pudgy belly. You look up at her in horror, noticing just how humongous her mouth is. She could swallow you whole in a second! You were just a bite-sized treat in comparison to her! “What are you looking so nervous about, sugah? I don’t bite!” She asked, playfully.

You blinked, a little hopeful that she would dispel your fears. “So you’re… not gonna eat me?”

“Hehe! Let’s not get ahead of ourselves, now!” She immediately giggled. “I can’t promise I’ll be able to resist gobbling up such a scrumptious-lookin’ lil boy!” Your heart was beating out of your chest as you heard those words. Was she being serious? She HAD to be joking, right? She couldn’t just EAT the kids she babysits! Maybe this whole thing was some sort of act in order to get you to behave. Well, if it was, it worked! You were going to be as obedient as can be today, for fear of winding up in that massive tummy otherwise.

She kept you tightly in her grip, pressed up against her squishy pudge as she walked around, knowing you’d probably just run away otherwise. She whistled as she gazed around the house. “Oooh! This is a nice apartment ya got here!” She smiled. “But to be honest… there’s only one room I’m really interested in!” With that, she carried you in her arms as she walked over to...

You cling nervously to her fluff as she starts walking, her every massive footstep shaking the floor beneath her. You knew your mom wouldn’t leave you with a sitter who would EAT you… but you still couldn’t shake your nervousness. You really didn’t like being treated like a snack. Suddenly, you were distracted from these thoughts when the hippo spoke up. “Can you guess what your mom is paying me to take care of you for the weekend?” She asked with a playful grin.

“Uh… I dunno…” You stutter, confused by the question.

“Zero dollars!” She smiled. “All I’m askin’ for is to be able to fill my tummy with ANYTHING in this apartment. And I do mean ANYTHING!” She looked you straight in the eyes with a smile on her face as she rubbed her huge, round belly with a hand, making it clear what she meant by ‘anything’. “Ya see, it’s so rare that I get to stuff this big belly of mine. But it’s always the best feeling! So, this weekend, you’re gonna help me with that!” You started to panic when you realized she was walking into the kitchen! Was she going to cook you into her dinner?

… nope. Instead, she just gently sets you down on the counter, as she goes digging through the pantry for other treats. Eventually, she let's you sit on her shoulders while she walks back to the living room, with a humongous bundle of food under each arm! She must be carrying half of the food you have in your house! She sighs in relaxation as she sits down on the couch, setting all of the food down beside her as she turns on the TV. She sets you down on her big, round, soft belly, which bounces a bit beneath you.

“Now, making it all the way up the stairs here really tuckered me out...” She gave you a big smile. “Think you could do me a favor, dear, and feed me all these delicious snacks?” Her request made you nervous… but you didn’t want to decline, lest you might end up on the menu! You nervously reached over and grabbed a watermelon, only to gaze in awe as her mouth opened incredibly wide! You winced as you gently set the watermelon down on her huge tongue, getting your hands a little wet with her slobber… only to gasp in shock as she swallows the watermelon in a single gulp!

You stare in surprise as the watermelon disappears down her cavernous throat, seemingly in an instant. Once it’s filled that tummy you’re sitting on, she smiles, licking her lips. “Mm, mm, mm! That was a good appetizer!” She smiled, only to see you sitting there, staring at her in awe. “Well? Ya ain’t done yet, sweetie pie! There’s still plenty of room in here for more snacks!” She patted her huge belly. With a nervous gulp, you reached down and grabbed some more food items, dropping them in her maw and watching them all disappear.

At this point, there was no doubt in your mind that she could swallow you whole with ease! You were nervous as you sat on her belly, looking down at her massive maw, knowing that, with one movement, you might just slip and fall in! This became especially scary as she started jiggling her belly slightly, making you whimper and hold on, almost losing your balance! You hated to imagine what would’ve happened if you HAD fallen into her mouth! Your heart was racing as you stuffed more and more food into her maw, feeling the stomach you’re sitting on get fuller and fuller.

Even when you thought for sure she had reached her limit, she just kept eagerly accepting more, until her round belly was twice it’s original size! You whimper as you hear it loudly gurgling as it digests all the food within. “Oooh! That really hit the spot!” She cooed, sitting back and patting her belly, now that all the food she brought with her is stuffed tightly within. “I don’t think I could eat another bite! I’m sooo stuffed! Mm… could you be a dear and give me a lil belly rub? My tummy’s a little sore…”

You sigh nervously, before rubbing your hands all over her huge, thick, blubbery gut, feeling the imprints of all the food within. She didn’t seem to want to eat you yet… she was just eating regular food, which was a good sign. Maybe she really didn’t eat people? You were afraid that even asking that question might get you into trouble… but you just had to be sure. The doubt was driving you crazy! “You don’t… actually eat kids, do you?” You nervously ask, as you continue rubbing your hands over her gut.

“Oh, of course I do! They’re my favorite food!” She giggled, nonchalantly. “I just love gobbling them up in one gulp, like the lil bite-sized treats they are, and feeling ‘em wriggle in my big, warm tummy!” Your heart dropped as you realized she was serious! You were starting to shake as you looked down at her huge belly, horrified by the thought that she’s actually stuffed kids into there. You shudder as it gurgles and groans loudly, indicating just how powerful it was. You knew enough about biology to know what happens to food… but she couldn’t have done that to them… could she?

“What… happens to them in there?” You stutter, your voice quivering.

“Oh, they get sloshed and jiggled and jostled all around! My belly’s like a big bounce house, or so I’ve been told!” She giggles, and you let out a startled yelp as she starts jiggling her belly around with her hands, sloshing around its contents.

She sadly shook her head, setting you down gently on the couch next to her. “Honey, no. I would never hurt anyone! Especially not some adorable kids! I may be a hungry kinda gal, but I ain’t a monster!” She insisted. “Is that why you’ve been so nervous this whole time? You thought I might… digest you?”

She seemed to be genuine, and you relaxed a bit as she pressed you against her belly. “Now, listen here. I would absolutely never harm a hair on your lil body. You sighed, thinking about it a long time. Getting eaten by the hippo… it was sort of a scary thought. But as long as she doesn’t hurt you… you suppose it’ll be okay. “... n-no. It’s okay. As long as you don’t hurt me… and it’s not too scary in there…”

My tummy’s still gotta take care of my dinner, so it’s not all messy in there when I gulp you down! In the meantime, what do you like to do for fun?”

You think about it for a moment, before deciding...

As you were trotting down the stairs of your apartment building, she was huffing and puffing, being very careful with every footstep so she doesn’t just fall down the stairs. You try to help her, pushing back against her gut to help her keep her balance… but when she finally DOES lose her balance, you realize you’re right in the way! With that, the two of you began a leisurely stroll around the park. She walked much slower now that you were following along by her side, helping you to keep up with her much larger form. All the while, you asked her questions about what life was like as a hippo. The more questions she answered, the more fascinated you are by her, and the more you start to like her. While she seemed scary at first, you were quickly starting to believe that she really wouldn’t ever hurt anybody… she was just a little mischievous!

Eventually, though, your conversation with her was interrupted by a loud growl emanating from her sloshing gut! You glanced over, only to be shocked when you realize that her belly had already shrunken considerably, her previous meal reduced to nothing! “Oh! Did you already digest all that food?” You asked, in awe at the sheer power of her stomach.

“Yup! All this walking has made me really work up an appetite!” She smiled, patting her sloshing gut. “Luckily, there’s some scrumptious looking snacks over there…” She giggled, licking her lips as she glanced at the park’s playground. There were about a half dozen kids playing there.

“Oh…” You stutter, your heart fluttering as you realize what she means. “Are you gonna… eat ‘em?”

“Mhmm! They look so yummy, it’d almost be a sin not to!” With that, she begins to excitedly stroll over towards it… and you reluctantly follow her, a little curious to see just how easily she can actually eat somebody. As she approached, a shy boy around half your age looked up at her in awe, seemingly shocked by her sheer size. “Why, hello, little one! How are you today?” She bent over to smile at him… only to notice him staring at her huge tummy! “Mm? What’s that? You wanna bounce on my big, belly? Well, sure! I don’t mind!”

He seemed a little confused, but when she lays down on her back and shows of her huge gut, he seems to understand. Hesitantly, the boy climbs up onto her gut, giggling at how sloshy it was. With her approval, he starts to bounce on her tummy like a trampoline… slowly at first, but quickly getting higher and higher. “Hehe… hahaha!” He started laughing, obviously having fun. You were surprised by just how much air time he could get! Her belly really was bouncy! Eventually, though, while he was descended, she shifted her belly a bit. “Whoa!”

That tiny change in the angle was enough for his next bounce to send him flying… straight into her mouth! You gasp in shock as the young boy slips right down her throat in a single instant. One moment he was there… and the next, he was just gone! He wasn’t even big enough to make a bulge in that big tummy of her’s… but she could still definitely feel him in there. “Mm… oh, that really hits the spot!” She cooed, rubbing her belly as the boy settled within. “He’s really wrigglin’ in there! Hehe! Oh, I always love these lil belly rubs!”

You gaze in awe at her belly, eventually working up the courage to rub against it. You pressed your cheek up against it, trying to hear him in there, but his protests are completely muffled by the thick layers of hippo blubber. Although you knew he wasn’t going to be hurt, you still felt bad for him. It must be scary to get eaten all of a sudden without expecting it. “Poor kid…” You frown.

“Ha! Don’t worry about him! My stomachs so warm, and soft, and comfy, they always learn to love it in there!” She smiled, rubbing her belly as she stands up, a triumphant grin on her face. “In the meantime… let’s see what other kinda snacks I can get my hands on…” She strolls around, until she glances at the slide, and gets an idea. “Ssshhh…” She presses a finger over her lips with a smirk as she turns to you, before wrapping her stretchy maw around the exit of the slide, so that any kid that slid down would shoot right down her gullet!

You watch, the suspense palpable, until eventually, you see a girl at the top of the slides, seemingly oblivious to the hippo waiting below. You could hear the slide creak as she slid down… and then, at the end, there was a sudden gulp! It was almost anticlimactic! Oldest trick in the book!” She smiled, her belly finally getting a little bit larger, now, though her appetite was still insatiable. “Oh, but they just made me even hungrier!”

You watched in awe as she playfully and sneakily picks ‘em all of one by one, slipping them into her belly without the others noticing. She let's out a big burp as she sits down on a nearby bench, feeling the youngsters wriggling around within. “Oh… now THAT was a meal! I couldn’t eat another bite!” She said, with the most satisfied expression you’ve ever seen. With that, she just sits back and relaxes, enjoying the many movements within her tummy.

Eventually, the youngsters started to relax, realizing it was actually rather nice and safe within her belly. With that, the movements finally came to a stop. “Mm… looks like they’re taking a nap in there, now! I’m glad they enjoyed~” She cooed. “Guess that’s my coo to spit ‘em out!” With that, you watched in awe as she leaned forward, and her neck bulged as she spat out all the kids she ate all at once. They were restfully slumbering and covered in hippo slobber, now, but other then that, they were all unharmed. You sigh in relief, seeing she was telling the truth.

“Well, that was fun!” She smiled. “What do ya wanna do now? Stick around downtown, maybe watch a movie… or should we just head home, so I can give you a glimpse of what it’s like in here?” You blushed as she poked her belly, playfully.

1133333.content:
Your parents have always sheltered you, to the point that you’ve hardly had anything that even remotely resembles independence or autonomy. Even now, though you can just move out, they come up with all sorts of measures to make sure you can’t leave the house without them… even hiring anthros to ‘babysit’ you. You knew what that really meant… they just hired these big, strong animal folk so that they can make sure you can’t escape the house! It’s always felt more like they were your prison guards than your caretakers, nice as they always were…

You guess it was time to meet this new ‘sitter’, though. With a mournful sigh, you pull yourself up to your feet and trot towards the front door, waiting to see whatever bear or wolf your parents have found this time. They really must look hard for these sitters, considering just how rare anthros were… but to be fair, they certainly made good ‘guards’. They were usually absolutely massive compared to most human women, with the strength to back up their size. Your eyes widened as you opened the door, though, to find tonight’s sitter might be even bigger than you imagined…

“Hey there, sweetheart! Well, aren’t you just the cutest~?” Not only did she stand a couple feet taller than yourself, but she was quite a bit… rounder than you expected. Last time you got a muscular feline gal… but tonight’s sitter was all pudge! From that huge belly that poked halfway out from beneath her overworked shirt, to those massive, wide hips that could just barely fit through your doorway. It was hard to even tell what species she was, as instead of fur, she was covered in slick, completely smooth skin, that seemed to be completely devoid of hair or fur.

Looking at her face, though, you realized… you instantly recognized her! “Bwuh… wuh…” Your mind draws a blank as you’re shocked with the sudden flashback to an even just a little less than a year ago, a memory that’s slightly faded in your mind but is now coming roaring back. You can almost feel the cool summer breeze as you mentally slip back to that day at the local pool, a day where you had just been trying to enjoy the rare freedom of not having to stick around at home all the time…

You had just been sipping on some soda as you leaned back on a pool chair, soaking in the sun’s rays… and then you saw her! This very orca! You figure aquatic anthros like her must really be drawn to the pool. Since you had been wearing sunglasses, you had felt comfortable just sort of watching the massive woman as she swam skilfully around the pool, rather intrigued. You weren’t really into anthros, but you had always sort of had a thing for… ‘larger’ women. And she certainly fit the bill! You’ve never seen anyone larger!


Despite this, she still showed off some incredible swimming skill, gliding through the water like it was all nothing, with a smile on her face all the while. You couldn’t keep track of how long you had been watching her… but one moment, when she had leaned against a corner of the pool close to you, you had heard her massive, fat belly growl hungrily. She licked her lips, apparently having worked up an appetite. You had expected her to head to the cafe… but instead, she wades deeper into the pool.

Confused, you watch as she seems to be directly approaching some kid who was playing around all by himself in some obscure corner of the pool, slinking underwater once she was halfway there. You kept your eyes on the pool, wondering just what she was doing hidden away beneath the way… until, all of a sudden, that kid disappeared! In an instant, he had slid down beneath the surface of the water, disappearing into the blueness below. You tilted your head, wondering when he’d resurface…

Instead, though, only the orca lady re-emerged. She let out a shuddering belched as she finally climbed out of the pool, the water dripping from her smooth, pudgy body, before she collapsed onto her back on a nearby pool chair that seemed far too small for her. You stared at her, trying to wrap your mind around where that kid must’ve went… until you notice a faint bulge in her gut! It was super subtle… you had to be staring directly at her gut with sheer concentration in order to notice it… but it was there! Almost like something was pushing from the inside!

You stared for probably half an hour, trying to figure out whether you were seeing things correctly. The bulges only appeared every once in a while, and each time they were so subtle, they could almost be construed as just your imagination. You hardly even wanted to consider the possibility that they weren’t your imagination - that the massive orca lady had imprisoned that young boy in her huge gut, letting the thick layers of pudge on her massive belly completely hide his movements! You didn’t know whether you hoped it was all just your imagination… or whether you hoped it was real.

Regardless, she eventually left, leaving you wondering from that day forward about what you saw. Eventually, you just dismissed it from your mind as a figment of your imagination. Still, seeing the massive orca couldn’t help but bring all that confusion right back into your head! Meanwhile, the orca just seemed to be confused. “Umm… are you alright, little one?” She asked, bending over, looking concerned. “Should I get you a glass of water? You seem woozy.”

“N-no… I’m…” You stutter, trying to shake your head and compose yourself. “I’m fine! Really! Thank you for the concern…”

“Hehe, no problem sweetheart! I’d be a terrible babysitter if I let my charge just pass out the moment I walked in~” She giggled, patting you on the head. With that, she managed to squeeze those huge hips through the door, before whistling as she looked around the sizable house. “My name’s Latoya! It’s nice to meet you, little cutie! I can already tell we’re gonna have a TON of fun together!”

Well, at least she seemed… nice. Although the way she was talking about you made you feel like she saw you as a child. “Uhhh… yeah,” you shrugged, following along after her as she trotted into the house. “I’m sure we are… wait, where are you going?” Sure enough, she seemed to be trotting deeper into the house, almost as if she had her mind set on something!

“I…I must be crazy. There’s no way that she just…expanded like that!” you said to yourself.

Ms. Snow sighed. “No, Vanessa, you are not crazy. And technically I didn’t ‘expand’, I merely did away with the illusion. And MMM does it feel fantastic to do so as well,” she said while running her fingers through her luxurious looking belly fur.

“Illusion?” you repeated, your mind still slipping.

“Yes, an illusion and a rather simple one at that.” A frown crossed her face, darkening her attractive features. “You…aren’t going to be just repeating bits of what I say, are you?”

“A bit too much to take in,” you managed to respond.

After a few minutes of thought, she gave a quick nod. “True, I’ll give you that.”

Then without another word, she swept past you. Your nose picked up a scent: floral for the most part, but with a spicy edge almost hidden. You were unsure why, but it made you feel a bit more at peace, your whirling mind slowing down a hair.

You found the cow making herself at home, sitting on the couch, her discarded sweater beside her. Her thighs spread out a bit, granting some room for the dome of her stomach to rest. Her breasts wobbled a bit as she repositioned herself on the couch, worming her round rump further into the cushions. She then turned her gaze towards you.
1253111.title: Peeling off layers

choices: …pushed Trish to sit down on the couch and sat down atop the snake.
12531111.content:
The suggestion of ordering pizza came out of nowhere. It stunned you with how simple it was after how strange everything had been up till then.

“The little ones and I are getting hungry,” she said as explanation as she rubbed her stomach.

As if on cue, her stomach let out a hungry roar. A flurry of activity came from within as well. The cow squirmed and bit her lip as she rubbed her hands across what she could reach of the swell of her belly. Did you see a hint of blush peeking through the fur and a curl to her lips? You shook it off and asked if she had any preference for what to get. It took several further seconds for her to answer that anything was fine. There was a tremor in her voice as she continued to need the sphere, but there was also something odd about her voice. You couldn’t quite place it.

You dismissed that concern too. Then you pulled out your phone, found the number of one of your favorite places and made an order. You upsized your usual and then did it again as you looked your babysitter over again.

Minutes spun past. After she had settled her brood, she turned on the TV. You rarely remained focused on the vapid show she selected. Instead, your gaze kept getting drawn to stare at the swollen curves of the cow beside you. After a bit, you would tear your eyes away, but soon after found yourself staring at her again. On the third or fourth of these back and forth glances, you jolted as you realized the cow was staring back at you. As you snapped your eyes forwards again though, you saw a bit of a grin tugging at the corners of her lips again.

As it was, you were thankful for the knock at the door. Hopping to your feet, you started to grab the money your parents left behind.

“Hold on, why don’t you use this?”

You turned to look at Ms. Snow. In her hand was a large coin, odd looking thing too. Besides to the strange symbol on the metal, it possessed a funny shimmer that grew more vibrant when you looked at it out of the side of your eye.

“I don’t think–“ you started to respond.

“Go on, just show them it and it will take care of everything,” she interrupted.

You sighed, thinking you should take the money and leave the weird coin behind. Then you noticed the earnest look on the cow’s face.

“All right, I don’t know why, but all right,” you said throwing your hands up, and then grabbing the coin.

In the short walk to the door, you noticed something else. The coin was warm, quite a bit warmer than it should have been. You shuddered as you thought about where she might have been hiding it. There was also a freaky…vibration coming from it. You couldn’t quite find the right word for the sensation spreading into your hand from the coin, but vibration seemed close enough.

Opening the door, you felt a slight grin on your face. You recognized the tall, slender snake standing there balancing the pizza box.

“Hey Trish, you said as she looked up from her phone.

“Oh heya, ‘Nessa. Wasn’t sure if this was your order, you having a party or somethin’?” She leaned a bit, peeking around you.

You responded that it was nothing like that. Trish seemed unconvinced, her brow tiling up on one side, but let the matter drop before telling you the price. You started to move to pull some money out before remembering the cow’s cryptic direction and her coin. Even though you were going to make a fool of yourself, you held the coin out.

“What’s…?” Trish’s voice trailed off, her eyes loosing focus even as they remained glued on the coin and her jaw slackened.

“Eh…Trish…what’s up?” you said, snapping your fingers in front of her face.

“It did work, didn’t it?” came Ms. Snow’s voice. You were about to ask her what was going on when she continued, “Excellent, tell her to come in.”

What in the world is going on? along with What in the world is this coin? swam through your head. You were not sure why but you did as you were directed again, telling Trish to come inside.

The snake moved through the door past you, her motions weird and far stiffer than the usual grace Trish possessed.

“Come on, come on…” Ms. Snow said with more than a little impatience in her voice from the couch, looking back over her shoulder as you entered the room with Trish still at your heels. Again, you were about to ask what had happened to Trish when the cow looked the snake over and said, “Hmm…knew I was right about you, and such a fine job already. Come over here darling.” She motioned for the snake.

Trish stepped around the couch. Ms. Snow took the pizza box from the snake’s stiff hands and set it on the table before her. Trish was still looking at you and the coin even if you dropped it from her view.

Then Ms. Snow shocked you yet again as she said, “Now my dear, take off your clothes.”

You gaped at what the cow was asking, and were about to shout. But then Trish followed the order and started taking off her clothes right there and without a word. Before long, every scrap of her outfit was piled beside her and she remained standing stock still before the cow, her scales gleaming. The shocking things were not at an end though, as then the cow…
12531111.title: A test

info.brief_description: You're parents hired a babysitter. But this Babysitter is an Anthro Woman. What a twist.
info.description:
So, you are a human character being babysat. And the twist in this story is, your babysitter is an anthro woman. What will happen in the story is completely up to you.

There some things that are off limits in this here story.

1. Hard Vore.
2. Death of Main character. (you) No Loopholes.
3. Abusive Babysitter.
4. Cursing.
5. Purposefully inflicting serious injury on the main character or babysitter.
6. Digestion, absorbtion, de-aging the main character to the point before he or she was conceived.
7. Turning the characters genders to herm, cuntboy, or any other abominations not found in nature.
8. Death of the Babysitter. Again, No Loopholes.
9. Abusing the babysitter.
10. Sexual intercourse should the main character (you) be underage. (This excludes unbirthing. And that also means no making the babysitter horny if she's breastfeeding the main character.)
11. Body swapping. The Babysitter's and Main character's (you) minds stay where they belong.
12. Gender changing the babysitter to male. She stays female.
13. Transforming the anthro babysitter to human. She stays anthro.
14. Gore.

If there are other scenarios you are unsure of, please email me onsite, and I'll let you know if things are allowed or not. And do not email me to request exceptions or changes to the rules. They are set, and only I will update them, if I feel the need to. Please help me get to 100 chapters.
